0100100010111110 1100110111001000 0 -> sum: 0001011010000110, cout: 1
0110001011000001 0010111111110011 0 -> sum: 1001001010110100, cout: 0

0101110010000100 0101001001100001 1 -> sum: 1010111011100110, cout: 0
0100101110110100 0010000111011011 0 -> sum: 0110110110001111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
